segments.text: There are things that are actually even smaller than atoms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are the things that make up the atom , such as electrons and protons .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything that is smaller than electrons and protons ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course there is . Things can be divided and broken down into indefinitely small parts if we can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really don't want to know about this . Physics gives me a headache .
segments.speaker: S2
